summary: Turns the Vanilla Stormcloak Cuirass into Heavy Armor with stats slightly below Imperial Heavy Armor. Can be upgraded at Workbench with an iron ingot.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION

Turns the Vanilla Stormcloak Cuirass into Heavy Armor with stats slightly below Imperial Heavy Armor. Can be upgraded at Workbench with an iron ingot.

BACKGROUND

I didn\'t want my manly Nord Stormcloak running around in light armor, so I changed the cuirass to heavy armor. I didn\'t do the other parts because I find it hard to justify making \"fur boots\" heavy armor. So if you want your Stormcloak Cuirass to be heavy, this is the mod for you.
Works better with this retexture mod that makes the armor look heavy: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6024 

INSTALLATION

Drop .esp into your Data Folder. Make sure it\'s checked in the Data Files.
author: nemo3590
